About.paragraph: Solving the world’s problems through technology wouldn’t be possible without our most important invention: the STRATEGYZer. Have a look at our innovative solutions.
About.paragraph2: We are a Pre-Seed Recruitment Accelerator Startup Vendor that specializes in diversity talent across the india with results in the technology, manufacturing & corporate landscape.

Why.text: Strong half a million+ CV database

Why2.text: Candidate experience Regular interaction and monitoring

Testimonials.text: Strategyz Inc. fosters a dynamic environment where I continuously learn and grow as a strategyzer.
Testimonials.name: Balraj Dhakar

Testimonials.text: Working with flexible hours has empowered me to optimize productivity, maintain work-life balance, and deliver exceptional results with unparalleled autonomy and satisfaction.
Testimonials.name: Atharva Jaurkar

Testimonials.text: Strategyz empowers individuals, serving as the nexus where innovative ideas converge, strategies evolve, and success unfolds organically.
Testimonials.name: Devashish Jindal

Testimonials.text: At Strategyz, The energizing work environment and supportive team make every day fulfilling and inspiring.
Testimonials.name: Garvit Jain

Testimonials.text: Strategyz empowers individuals, fostering a sense of ownership and accountability.
Testimonials.name: Sarthak Joshi

Testimonials.text: At Strategyz, I'm proud to be part of a vibrant startup where our incredible work culture fuels creativity and teamwork every day.
Testimonials.name: Ambuj Srivasatava

Contact.address: Abiroo Strategyz Technologies Private Limited, We Work Institutional Area, Sector 44, Gurgaon, Haryana, India - 122002
Contact.address2: Abiroo Strategyz Technologies Private Limited, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India - 560076

Features.title: Quality
Features.text: We use 15+ sourcing channels to source quality resumes.

Features.title: Speed
Features.text: You can expect the first batch of resumes within 3 - 4 days.

Features.title: Time Saving
Features.text: All resumes received will be pre-screened to save your screening time.

Features.title: Assurance
Features.text: Model is completely postpaid, with 30 days refund/replacement clause to safeguard your interests.
